title: Supply and demand shift for tomatoes

content.prompt: On the basis of the graph above, which of the following statements concerning changes in the demand for and supply of tomatoes is correct?

choices.label: If both the demand and supply increase, the price of tomatoes will definitely increase.
If both the demand and supply decrease, the quantity of tomatoes sold will definitely increase.
If the demand decreases while the supply increases, the price of tomatoes sold will definiftely increase
If the demand decreases while the supply increases, the quantity of tomatoes sold will definitely decrease.
If the demand increases while the supply decreases, the price of tomatoes will definitely increase.
